stories.title: Issues we've encountered while building a Kafka based data processing pipeline

stories.text: I just read an article yesterday with some tips on how to instead of seeking cheap dopamine, you should rather go for a walk, etc. Didn't finish reading it and can't find it on Hacker News now. Does anyone have a link?
stories.title: Help find article on avoiding cheap dopamine and instead going for a walk

stories.text:
I love reporting bugs and GDPR issues whenever I notice them. When I am talking about GDPR issue I mean obvious things like non-secure websites on which you have to fill a form with personal details to ask for a birth certificate ( http://etatcivil.evreux.fr/ . Can you see the missing 's' ?)

I feel like I am doing a favour to the company to which I send the report and that I am contributing to make the internet a better place. However most of the time I am being ghosted. It actually only happened once that a company for which I am not paying a lot of money fixed a bug I reported.
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you report bugs or GDPR issues?
